name: Profane
description: Profaned covers anything once sacred, honored, or pure that has been twisted, commercialized, or outright defiled. Shrines turned into stockyards, ancestral groves cut for lumber, holy days turned to excuses for cruelty—all of these fall under this Aspect. Symbols of faith, law, or tradition still linger, but they’re cracked, mocked, or repurposed in unsettling ways. In a Profaned environment, reverence and disgust walk the same roads, and nothing noble is safe from being dragged through the mud.

tables.description: Profaned covers anything once sacred, honored, or pure that has been twisted, commercialized, or outright defiled. Shrines turned into stockyards, ancestral groves cut for lumber, holy days turned to excuses for cruelty—all of these fall under this Aspect. Symbols of faith, law, or tradition still linger, but they’re cracked, mocked, or repurposed in unsettling ways. In a Profaned environment, reverence and disgust walk the same roads, and nothing noble is safe from being dragged through the mud.

tableData.result: Restore a defiled shrine to its original sanctity.
Expose the merchants profiting from sacred relics.
Retrieve a holy artifact repurposed as a mundane tool.
Prevent a festival from turning into a mockery of ancient rites.
Uncover the truth behind a corrupted ancestral tradition.
Sabotage the commercialization of a once-holy grove.

Investigate whispers of twisted laws in an old courthouse.
Reclaim symbols of honor now used in vulgar displays.
Challenge a leader who twists sacred vows for personal gain.
Purify a spring tainted by industrial runoff.
Document the decline of revered customs into base entertainment.

Confront guardians who have betrayed their sacred oaths.
Rebuild a cracked monument to forgotten heroes.

Dismantle a market built over burial grounds.
Seek forgiveness for unintentional acts of desecration.
Expose hidden dealings that corrupt temple finances.
Recover a profaned idol from a tavern's decor.
Challenge traditions warped by greed and neglect.
Purify air fouled by factories on sacred hills.
Investigate festivals that mock ancient deities.
Reclaim land from those who felled holy trees for profit.
Confront elders who commercialize spiritual practices.
Restore dignity to a site used for illicit gatherings.
Unravel the curse from a twisted holy relic.
Protect pilgrims from exploitative guides at defiled sites.
Document profane alterations to historical texts.
Sabotage auctions of sacred artifacts as novelties.
Seek out hermits guarding untainted traditions.
Interrupt the perversion of marriage rites into spectacles.
Rebuild faith in a community scarred by betrayal.
Trace origins of laws now enforced with cruelty.
Gather evidence against those defiling natural sanctuaries.
Rescue animals from sacrificial altars turned slaughterhouses.
Challenge the repurposing of temples as warehouses.
Purify soil desecrated by toxic waste on holy ground.
Expose the ridicule of prophetic visions in street plays.
Reclaim heirlooms from pawnshops dealing in relics.
Confront artists who mock divine imagery for profit.
Restore a bridge once a pilgrimage path, now a toll road.
Investigate the twisting of oaths into binding contracts.
Safeguard forgotten graves from urban expansion.
Dismantle barriers around profaned natural wonders.
ACTION + THEME
ROLL TWICE

Symbols of faith, law, or tradition still linger, but they’re cracked, mocked, or repurposed in unsettling ways. tableData.result: The air hangs heavy with the scent of incense mixed with rotting refuse.
Faint echoes of forgotten chants mingle with coarse laughter.
Shadows twist unnaturally around cracked stone altars.
A chill wind carries whispers of ancient curses.
The ground feels sticky underfoot, stained by spilled offerings.
Dim light filters through grimy stained glass, casting mocking patterns.
The atmosphere thickens with the tang of commercial greed.
